fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- As an Achromatic color, Black can Color a player to turn them into a Color, as long as a Primary Color is also selecting to Color the same player.
- Black, among other things, symbolizes death, mystery, and power. Black can cause a blackout at a player's home, preventing most from wandering in. Only those with the intent to kill have the courage to step inside, and they may attack anyone at the house. Any attackers will randomly attack a visitor, or the original target. Other visitors will not succeed with their ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Black is the absence of any color. It can only be created by a Color fading away during the night, unable to expose them to any color before their death, turning them Black. It cannot spawn in the starting rolelist.
- A blackout takes a large amount of energy to perform. After being used, it cannot be used the next night, but it can be used the night after that.
- As Black only exists out of dead players, it may act while dead.
Color Combinations:
- Black and Red (3575) makes Burgundy (3581).
- Black and Yellow (3576) makes Dark Green (3583).
- Black and Blue (3577) makes Navy Blue (3585).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paint the Town into a rainbow!
